title: Copy-on-selection in preview pane
description: Enable automatic clipboard copy when highlighting text in the file preview pane. Upon releasing the left mouse button after highlighting, selected text is copied to clipboard and a transient toast confirms 'Copied to clipboard' in the upper-right corner.
design: TDD approach: write all tests first (RED), then implement features to make tests pass (GREEN). Uses arboard crate for clipboard. Selection state tracked via selection_start, selection_end, is_selecting fields. Toast uses toast_text and toast_start with Tick-based auto-dismiss.
acceptance_criteria: Mouse drag in preview pane visually highlights selected text. On mouse release, selected text is copied to system clipboard. Toast notification appears in upper-right corner for ~1.5 seconds. Selection works correctly with word-wrapped and scrolled content. All tests pass.

title: Add arboard clipboard dependency
description: Add arboard = "3" to Cargo.toml for cross-platform clipboard support.
acceptance_criteria: Cargo.toml includes arboard dependency. cargo build succeeds.

title: Handle MouseDown in preview pane
description: In Msg::Mouse handler, detect MouseDown(Left) in preview pane area. Set selection_start to mouse position, set is_selecting = true.

title: Handle MouseDrag during selection
description: Handle MouseDrag/MouseMove events while is_selecting is true. Update selection_end to current mouse position.

title: Handle MouseUp to finalize selection and copy
description: On MouseUp(Left), finalize selection: call map_cell_to_char for start/end, extract_selected_text, copy to clipboard via arboard, set toast_text and toast_start, clear is_selecting.

title: Implement toast rendering in view()
description: In view(), when toast_text is Some, render a small Block overlay in upper-right corner of preview pane with 'Copied to clipboard' text and distinct styling.

title: Implement toast auto-dismiss via Tick
description: In Msg::Tick handler, check if toast_start is older than 1.5 seconds. If so, clear toast_text and toast_start.

title: Implement selection highlight rendering
description: In view(), when is_selecting or selection exists, render selected cells with inverted fg/bg colors. Integrate with Paragraph rendering or post-process buffer.

title: Final verification: all tests pass
description: Run cargo test and verify all tests pass. Run cargo clippy and fix any warnings. Ensure cargo build --release succeeds.
acceptance_criteria: cargo test passes with no failures. cargo clippy has no warnings. cargo build --release succeeds.

title: Write selection state tests
description: Write tests for selection state management: selection_starts_on_mouse_down_in_preview, selection_updates_on_mouse_drag, selection_clears_on_mouse_up, selection_ignored_outside_preview_pane, selection_canceled_on_escape.
acceptance_criteria: All selection state tests exist and compile (they will fail until implementation).

title: Write text position mapping tests
description: Write tests for map_cell_to_char function: map_cell_to_char_basic, map_cell_to_char_with_scroll, map_cell_to_char_word_wrapped, map_cell_to_char_out_of_bounds, map_cell_to_char_multibyte_utf8.
acceptance_criteria: All position mapping tests exist and compile (they will fail until implementation).

title: Write selection text extraction tests
description: Write tests for extract_selected_text function: extract_selection_single_line, extract_selection_multi_line, extract_selection_reversed, extract_selection_empty, extract_selection_full_content.
acceptance_criteria: All extraction tests exist and compile (they will fail until implementation).

title: Write toast lifecycle tests
description: Write tests for toast behavior: toast_appears_after_copy, toast_has_start_time, toast_dismissed_after_tick, toast_persists_before_timeout, new_copy_resets_toast_timer.
acceptance_criteria: All toast lifecycle tests exist and compile (they will fail until implementation).

title: Write rendering tests for selection and toast
description: Write tests for visual rendering: render_selection_highlight, render_selection_partial_line, render_selection_multi_line, render_toast_position, render_toast_content, render_no_toast_when_none.
acceptance_criteria: All rendering tests exist and compile (they will fail until implementation).

title: Add selection and toast state fields to FileBrowser
description: Add fields to FileBrowser struct: selection_start: Option<(u16, u16)>, selection_end: Option<(u16, u16)>, is_selecting: bool, toast_text: Option<String>, toast_start: Option<Instant>. Update make_test_browser helper.
acceptance_criteria: Selection state tests pass. FileBrowser compiles with new fields.

title: Implement map_cell_to_char function
description: Implement map_cell_to_char(x, y, preview_text, scroll, wrap_width) -> Option<usize> that maps cell coordinates to character index accounting for word wrapping and scroll offset.
acceptance_criteria: All text position mapping tests pass.

title: Implement extract_selected_text function
description: Implement extract_selected_text(start_idx, end_idx, preview_text) -> String that extracts the selected text range, handling reversed selections.
acceptance_criteria: All selection text extraction tests pass.
